title: Solving Freshwater Conservation Challenges through Next-Generation Sequencing Approaches

Freshwater ecosystems face numerous conservation challenges due to anthropogenic pressures and environmental changes, necessitating advanced monitoring methods for effective conservation strategies. Traditional monitoring approaches have limitations, including low resolution and...
